name: Cloud Of Souls
summary: Cloud Of Souls is an online multiplayer game inspired by Zelda and Twitch Play Pokemon. You play one of the numerous souls trapped inside a human body. Go on a quest to get your freedom back!
storyline: Cloud Of Souls is an online multiplayer game inspired by Zelda and Twitch Play Pokemon. You play one of the numerous souls trapped inside a human body. Go on a quest to get your freedom back!
